author: vhardy
msg: SVGRenderingAccuracyTest so that it can be subclassed
for tests which need to manipulate the SVG DOM before
Added generation of anchors in the output HTML.

author: vhardy
msg: Modified file naming approach for test resource files such as
comparison images and so forth. Now, file names are only random
if a meaningful name cannot be created from the SVG file URL.

author: vhardy
msg: Modified regard output structure. Now, reports are generated in
a test-reports subdirectory with the following naming convention:
All report resources for one test run are under that directory,
which makes it easier to archive test results.
